scripts.build:e2e-client: docker build -f client/Dockerfile.configured client -t montepouli_client:e2e --build-arg CLIENT_BASE_IMAGE_NAME=montepouli_client --build-arg CLIENT_BASE_IMAGE_TAG=latest --build-arg CLIENT_TYPE=e2e
scripts.build-e2e-app: yarn build:client && yarn build:e2e-client && yarn build:server
scripts.start:e2e-environment-base: yarn build:e2e-environment && yarn restart:e2e-db && docker-compose -f docker-compose-e2e.yml up
scripts.start:e2e-tests: docker-compose -f docker-compose-e2e.yml build e2e-tests && docker-compose -f docker-compose-e2e.yml up -d e2e-tests
scripts.docker-compose-rebuild: docker-compose build && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d
scripts.docker-compose-rebuild-no-cache: docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d
